text: @SpeakerPelosi It's amazing how you have the unmitigated gall to spew such lies to the American people! You, Pelosi, politicized the COVID-19 pandemic stimulus package by holding it up to add in money for your pet projects. That was blackmail/quid pro quo you should resign.
